divs: Sighting DetailsPlacing cam on tripod left unattended and fiming approx 40 mins. Upon reviewing at 22 min mark a dark ring like "PROBE" is seen first going straight up, ascending, and 2-3 seconds later object is descending. Upon descent object had turned slightly giving another view different angle. This was approx 9-9:30 am weathre conditions in San Antonio, Tx cloudy an hazy. Please see pics. Video to be uploaded YT,
